name: FullBlast
overview: You're our hero, Kill them! Many have tried and lost their lives ... it seemed that the war against these horrible things would be a cakewalk, but this is taking more than expected, humanity needs you! You're our hero, Kill them! Fullblast is a fast paced action game, go and save the earth through an amazing level full of aliens. Fantastic and gorgeous 3D graphics. Power ups and power downs!!, watch out what you pick. Heavy metal sound track.
